mapper.select: SELECT UpPhoto.*, food.FOODCAL, food.FOOD_TAN, food.FOOD_DAN, food.FOOD_GI, food.foodweight FROM UpPhoto JOIN normal_mem ON UpPhoto.nnum = normal_mem.nnum JOIN food ON UpPhoto.foodnum = food.FOODNUM WHERE TRUNC(UpPhoto.uploaddate) = TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND normal_mem.normal_id = #{user_id}

SELECT uploaddate FROM memberfood m JOIN upphoto u ON m.upphotoid = u.upphotoid WHERE TRUNC(u.uploaddate) = (SELECT TRUNC(uploaddate) FROM upphoto WHERE upphotoid = #{upphotoid}) AND m.nnum = (SELECT nnum FROM upphoto WHERE upphotoid = #{upphotoid})
mapper.update: UPDATE memberfood m SET m.rating = m.rating + 1 WHERE m.upphotoid IN ( SELECT u.upphotoid FROM upphoto u WHERE TRUNC(u.uploaddate) < TRUNC(#{uploaddate}) )
update upphoto set mass = #{mass} where upphotoid = #{upphotoid}
mapper.select: SELECT f.foodweight, f.foodcal, f.food_tan, f.food_dan, f.food_gi FROM food f JOIN upphoto u ON f.foodnum = u.foodnum WHERE u.upphotoid = #{upphotoid}
mapper.update: update upphoto set foodnum = #{after} where upphotoid = #{upphotoid}
mapper.select: select IMG_EDITCOMMENT from (select IMG_EDITCOMMENT, EDIT_REQUEST_ID from imgediterequest where up_photo_id = #{upphotoid} order by EDIT_REQUEST_ID desc) where rownum = 1
